SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessScene
Controller of the scene in which the user can insert the ID of the lobby that he wants to join
Bag
Container with all the cards of the game
Board
Board of the game from where the players can pick the cards to add to their bookshelves
BoardMessage
Message containing the board updated after a tile refill
BoardTile
Tile that adds a boolean attribute to check whether it is a playable one (needed to give the board, a tile matrix, its shape)
Bookshelf
Bookshelf of a player where the cards picked from the board can be added
BookshelfMessage
Message containing the bookshelf updated after an insertion
BookshelfScene
 
Card
Card of the game identified by an image and a color
CardType
 
ChatMessage
 
CheckUsernameRequest
Request sent by the player to check the availability of the username he chose
CLI
 
Client
Manages the client side network functionalities
ClientController
Manages the messages received from the server by calling the methods of the user interface.
ClientHandler
Controller that manages the reception and the sending of messages between the server and a specific client
CliUtil
 
CommonGoal
Generic common goal functionalities
CommonGoal0
The always present game common goal (the one on the board)
CommonGoal1
Two groups each containing 4 tiles of the same type in a 2x2 square.
CommonGoal10
Five tiles of the same type forming an X
CommonGoal11
Five tiles of the same type forming a diagonal
CommonGoal12
Five columns of increasing or decreasing height.
CommonGoal2
Two columns each formed by 6 different type of tiles
CommonGoal3
Four groups each containing at least 4 tiles of the same types (not necessarily in the depicted shape).
CommonGoal4
Six groups each containing at least 2 tiles of the same type (not necessarily in the depicted shape).
CommonGoal5
Three columns each formed by 6 tiles of maximum three different types.
CommonGoal6
Two lines each formed by 5 different types of tiles.
CommonGoal7
Four lines each formed by 5 tiles of maximum three different types.
CommonGoal8
Four tiles of the same type in the four corners of the bookshelf.
CommonGoal9
Eight tiles of the same type.
CommonGoalFactory
 
CommonGoalsMessage
Message containing the details regarding the game common goals
ConnectionScene
Controller of the scene in which the user can choose whether to create a new lobby of join an existing one
CoordinatesMessage
Message containing the coordinates of cards that were either checked or removed from the board
CreateLobbyRequest
Request sent by the player to create a new lobby
EmptyBagException
 
FullColumnException
 
Game
 
GameController
Calls the VirtualView to sent messages to the Client.
GameScene
Controller of the actual game scene where the player can interact with the game entities
GenericMessage
Message containing a generic description
GenericScene
Generic controller with the functionalities shared by all the other specific ones
GetCardException
 
Goal
Basic functionality of any kind of goal
GUI
 
GUIManager
Manages the reception of messages from the server and calls their needed implementation relatively to the scene
InsertionRequest
Request sent by the player with the column where to insert the selected cards
JoinLobbyRequest
Request sent by the player to join an existing lobby
Lobby
Lobby with an instance of the game
LobbyScene
Controller of the scene where at most four players wait for the lobby master (one of them) to start the game
Main
 
Message
General functionalities of a message
MessageType
 
NetworkInterface
General functionalities of both server and client side network interfaces
NetworkPlayer
Class that links the username of the player to the ClientHandler and VirtualView of their relative Client
NetworkScene
Controller of the scene where the user has to choose IP and port of the server before starting the game application
NewGameRequest
 
Observer
 
Player
Player of the game with a username and a bookshelf
PrivateGoal
Player-specific private goal
PrivateGoalFactory
 
PrivateGoalMessage
Message containing the details regarding the player-specific private goal
Scoreboard
Class Scoreboard used in end game phase to print "username: score" ordered by descendant
ScoreboardMessage
Message containing the final scoreboard of the game
SelectionRequest
Request sent by the player to make a card selection
Server
 
SpatialTile
Tile that adds its coordinates as attributes to allow for pattern recognition
SpecificResponse
Message that contains a specific feedback, either true or false, with its description
StartGameRequest
Request made by the lobby master to start the game
Subject
A subject maintains a list of its observers and notifies them of any state changes
TextResponse
Message that contains a server textual message that has to be perceived either as a negative or a positive one
Tile
Generic tile that can contain a game card
ToolXML
Tool that turns XML resources into Java code
TurnManager
"Iterator" that has the role to select the current player relatively to the logic of the game
UserInterface
Defines all the methods used by the user interface (CLI/GUI) to take input from keyboard and call the methods in ClientController that generate the respective message to send to the Server
UsernameListMessage
Message containing the updated username list of the players in a lobby
UsernameScene
Controller of the scene where the user can choose his username and check for its availability
View
Standardization of all the methods that the Server uses to send requests, updates, error messages, etc Implemented by VirtualView (called by GameController) and CLI/GUI (Server -> Client, CLI/GUI -> User)
VirtualModel
Client side abstraction of the game entities
VirtualView
Manages the creation of messages from server to client
WinnerScene
